recipesJson.name: Plebes
recipesJson.author: Ike_Malkov
recipesJson.description:
A Fruity Pebbles base.
I really love lemony cereals unlike what seems like everyone else on here.

Edit: Took out Cap Juicy Lemon. Like in some of my lemonades it gives a syrupy feeling to the mix which doesn't work here. Bumped down some flavor% was giving me palette fatigue.
